Looking Onward to 2023 In 2023, I'm excited to have the opportunity to serve you in the Majority in the House of Representatives. As we transition into the 118th Congress, I will continue to bring our Wisconsin values and common-sense solutions to Washington to work in a bipartisan manner to make the Sixth District, Wisconsin, and the whole country a better place to live.

Chag Sameach! Click the image above for more information Last week, I spoke at the 18th Annual Lakeshore Technical College Legislative Breakfast in Sheboygan about the value of career and technical education (CTE) and the need to shine a light on the many benefits of CTE to younger Americans, like job security and less student loan debt.

Establishing the Select Committee on the Strategic Competition Between the United States and the Chinese Communist Party Establishes a Select Committee on China to drive policy debate in Congress and prompt the White House to consider its approach to Beijing in a clearer light. This Committee, which was authorized with overwhelming bipartisan support, will provide reports to House leadership or any committee regarding the results of its investigations and studies including detailed findings, policy recommendations, and legislative proposals on strategies to combat China's influence in the United States and on the world stage.
